attributes.action: give concessions to the over 60's for evening classes run by local council;
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the concessions for over 60's has been stopped by local council we try to keep ourselves fit and healthy by taking exersise that we can afford but now the goverment has stopped our concessions so that we can no longer
afford it this means that eventually we will become a burden to the NHS.
